description.value: The character's comrade provides crucial assistance during delicate demolitions work, helping to minimize the consequences of errors.

system.benefit: As long as the character's Comrade is in Cohesion, the character reduces Degrees of Failure on any Failed Tech-Use Test for the Demolitions Special Use by their Agility Bonus, to a minimum of 1.

specialAbilities.name: Demolitions Safety
specialAbilities.description: When your Comrade is in Cohesion, reduce Degrees of Failure on failed Tech-Use Tests for Demolitions by your Agility Bonus (minimum 1 DoF remaining).
